Package domein

Class BestellingBeheerder

java.lang.Object
domein.BestellingBeheerder
public class BestellingBeheerder extends Object
Manager class for Orders containing:
  • An ObservableList of orders
  • A FilteredList of the same orders filtered on a predicate
  • A SortedList of the same orders sorted by the
    specified Comparator(s)

  • Constructor Details

    • BestellingBeheerder

      public BestellingBeheerder(Gebruiker leverancier, BestellingService bs)
      Extra constructor mainly for Mockito-injection
      Parameters:
      leverancier - Singleton logged-in user
      bs - a new BestellingServiceDbImpl from default constructor
      facilitates Mockito-injection for testing

    • BestellingBeheerder

      public BestellingBeheerder()
      Constructs a new BestellingBeheerder
      to manage orders.
      • Also initializes the order service class which calls the DB
      • and creates/fills the lists with orders.
      This default constructor is the main constructor in use.

  • Method Details

    • getBestellingen

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Bestelling> getBestellingen()
      This returns the sorted list of orders sorted by the Comparators.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of sorted orders

    • changeFilter

      public void changeFilter(LocalDate filterDate, OrderStatus filterOrderStatus, BetalingsStatus filterBetalingsStatus, String filterValue, Klant klant)
      This sets the predicate on which the FilteredList
      filteredBestellingen will be filtered.
      Parameters:
      filterValue - String determining the new predicate on which to filter
